page.title: 03WIVELISCOMBE SQUARE SCHEME
page.content: of the seats and the different shades of red.Most felt that people would be encouraged to keep the area tidy.There is a lot of controversy about parking in the Square,three quarters of councillors are not in favour but local traders and residents have signed a petition asking for an enquiry.Those passing through disagreed with parking alongside the paved area,but local traders fear that a loss of short term parking will lead to a loss of trade and eventually closure."If the CO-OP goes we all go". Everyone agreed that it was unfortunate but necessary to have lorries delivering to the shops.Now that the pavement has been widened in West street (an exit from the Square) should there be a one way system?, feelings were mixed.
